comments.body:
This is OK-but-not-ideal behavior - I think pandas' approach is to write tests around that behavior but also to note that. 
Something like "TODO: not ideal to convert to DatetimeIndex, but...", and maybe an issue number
this is ok for now, IIRC this is on the master PR list already?
